Package geometry

Class Polygon

java.lang.Object
geometry.Obstacle
geometry.Polygon
Direct Known Subclasses:
Rectangle, Triangle
public class Polygon extends Obstacle
Class stores list of points that represent a polygon
Version:
3.3 28/04/2023
Author:
Alexandre Rodrigues, Miguel Cabrita and Afonso Rio

      public Point[] getAnchorPoints()
      Calculates a set of outside points relative to the obstacle's position
      These points can be added to a path to make it go around an obstacle
      Implementation for obstacles of polygon type
